title: Research Topic: Judicial System Strain: Court Responses to Constitutional Crisis
summary: Based on the research priority 'Judicial System Strain: Court Responses to Constitutional Crisis', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Research how federal courts handled unprecedented constitutional questions around emoluments enforcement, National Guard authority, and presidential accountability during 2025 crisis.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
